physical_appearance: "The image displays a picture postcard. It is rectangular in shape and it features a woman. She is dressed in a Chinese costume with a headdress. She is also holding onto a pole that supports a yellow flag with the image of a dragon on it. ""China"" is stated at the left hand side. ""Copyrighted by The P Co. N.Y."" is stated at the bottom right hand corner. The signature of the artist is displayed at the bottom right hand of the image on the postcard. "
